FuncDef: Use the display logbuffer command to display the status of the log buffer and the records in the log buffer.
CLIs: display logbuffer [ unit <unit-id> ] [ level <severity> | size <buffersize> ]* [ { begin | exclude | include } <regular-expression> ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an information severity level. The severity argument ranges from 1 to 8.
Specifies the size of the log buffer (number of messages the log buffer holds) you want to display. The buffersize argument ranges from 1 to 1,024 and defaults to 512.
Filters output log information with a regular expression.
Displays the log information beginning with the specified characters.
Displays the log information excluding the specified characters.
Displays the log information including the specified characters.

msg: Error CLI:display logbuffer [ unit <unit-id> ] [ level <severity> | size <buffersize> ]* [ | { begin | exclude | include } <regular-expression> ]
